author: Staff Reporter
text:
The District Legal Services Authority (DLSA) and Mahindra Home Finance (MHF) jointly organised a Lok Adalat here on Thursday to arrive at mediated settlement on bad debt cases and settlement was arrived in 47 cases.

The Lok Adalat took up 220 cases of Non Performing Assets of MHF. Retired judge Manivel, Lok Adalat members K. Anbalagan and Muthaiyan participated.

Nearly 47 cases were mediated and settled.

As a result Rs.16.91 lakh would be paid by the borrowers to the firm. Rs.2.49 lakh was paid on the spot. Annamalai, Admininstrative Officer of DLSA made the arrangements.
title: 47 cases settled in Lok Adalat
